name: bulk-move
title: Bulk Move
description: Move or remove posts in bulk from one category, tag or custom taxonomy to another

scripts.test: npm run mock && npm run unit
scripts.test:coverage: rm -rf code-coverage && mkdir code-coverage && npm run test:mock-c && npm run test:unit-c
scripts.test:html-coverage: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:merge-coverage -- --html code-coverage/html/
scripts.test:cover-coverage: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:merge-coverage -- --clover=code-coverage/bulk-move.clover
scripts.travis: npm run composer:validate && npm run phpcs && npm run test:cover-coverage
